attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
UK pensioners are the poorest in the EU, according to a recent report.   How can our pensioners be treated so miserly, when other EU countries pay full pensions at 60, with much higher amounts (e.g. Italy)?    It is time for
a radical change in the UK pension
system, so that no pensioner will live
in abject poverty, as many do now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
